programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Jordan: Nature's Furnace
programme.desc: The natural world of the Middle East is governed by one natural force - the Sun. It claims its victims and breathes new life. The wildlife in Jordan faces some of the natural worlds greatest chalenges.

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Turkey: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: Turkey is a land of contrasts, where the wildlife faces extreme challenges. Mountains, altitude, climatic changes, hostile coastlines, and earthquakes all play their part but, somehow, the wildlife battles the odds and survives.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent. They include some of the highest peaks outside the Himalayas.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Vietnam: Phoenix from the Ashes
programme.desc: Around 10% of the world's species live in Vietnam, with tropical jungles fit to burst with wildlife. But less than 50 years ago, things were very different. During the war, Vietnam's forests were decimated, but as it always does, life fought back.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace

programme.title: Bride of the Monster

programme.title: The Unearthly
programme.desc: A mad scientist creates havoc when an experiment to stop the aging process goes awry.

programme.title: Monster A-Go-Go

programme.title: Untamed Youth

programme.desc: In the service challenge, VIP guests rapper Flo Rida and comic Jeff Dunham join the local chefs and their families. An angry Ramsay has to merge the teams to finish the service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams can only have one chef in the kitchen at a time as they prepare three entrees, each with a different protein.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of the two Ford Falcons. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a classic 1958 Harley Davidson and a 1984 Kawasaki police cruiser.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1944 vintage firetruck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a wild 60's inspired show truck. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues on a wild 60's inspired show truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage: Ten Ton Truck
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a vintage military transport truck.

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos."

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.desc: Crime Investigation Australia has conducted a major investigation which reveals the inside story of the Megan Kalajzich murder and the extraordinary police investigation which will rock the Harbour City's elite to the core.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Buried Alive: Luckman and Reid
programme.desc: On the night of 4 May 1982, 13-year-old Terry Ryan rushed into his family home in Marsden, a suburb of Brisbane, and told his mother an astonishing story.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: A Dry Spell
programme.desc: Meg is faced with a difficult decision: to stay at the place she loves or to leave with the man she loves.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Three's A Crowd
programme.desc: Harry yearns to know all about Peter Johnson who seems to be settling in at Drovers Run. His background check turns up a surprise, but unable to inform Claire himself, he tells Becky who must decide what to do with the information.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Bridle Waltz
programme.desc: Harry guilt-trips Becky into telling Claire that Peter is married. Liz tries to reconcile Harry and the boys. Tess decides to leave Drovers Run and work in the café with Simon and Briny.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: To Have And To Hold
programme.desc: Claire's relationships are fragmented - she and Becky are barely speaking, and Tess is now living in Melbourne, unaware of recent events.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Home is Where the Heart is
programme.desc: Claire is taking the loss of both Peter and Tess badly. Unable to raise energy or enthusiasm for anything, including the imminent birth of Blaze's foal, she nonetheless refuses to accept she is suffering from emotional stress.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wildfire
programme.desc: Becky's brother Mark reappears, determined to drag Sean away from his wholesome life at Killarney. Mark knocks Nick out and coerces Sean into helping steal the Ryans' prize stallion, Wildfire.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Politics
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads down South to help two different families find some closure. First stop is Baton Rouge, Louisiana to investigate the Old State Capital Building, which has endured theCivil War and a congressman's death.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Curtain Call
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Joliet, Illinois to investigate the Rialto Square Theater, which is becoming known for being more than just an entertainment venue.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fear Factory
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Claremont, New Hampshire to investigate a former shoe and furniture factory, the Topstone Mill. What was once an abandoned space has now become a restaurant and bar...

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Tunnels of Terror
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lockport, New York to investigate an underworld of tunnels. It holds a mystery of possible murder, multiple deaths and frightening phenomena. What stories do the spirits of Lockport Caves want to tell?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Heir Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hampton Falls, New Hampshire to investigate the Governors Mansion, a property Steve has investigated before with a local team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Operation Repo: It's Not Funny
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a comedian's preparations for a show to repossess his Dodge, but not if his girlfriend has anything to say about it. Then, Lyndah & Sonia respond to a tip and sabotage a paparazzo's big shot by hooking his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Zamboni?
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a debtor's tattooing session to reclaim his vehicle. Then, Sonia and Lyndah find themselves in an uncomfortable situation when they barge in on a couple engaging in some risqué role-playing.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Instruction and Destruction
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Angry Swarms
programme.desc: Matt, Lou, and Lyndah try to repo a car from a man who is not afraid to throw some punches. Then, Matt and Lou face a dilemma when they realize their target vehicle is filled with angry bees. And, Sonia and Froy hit the airwaves to reclaim a truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smart and Stupids
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Basher vs. Matt
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo a vehicle in a bad part of town and somebody gets punched in the face. Then, Sonia and Lyndah interrupt a tennis match to retrieve an automobile. Plus, Matt and Froy confront an out-of-control director in the middle of a shoot.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt, Froy, and Lou get a tip on a car whose owner has a boyfriend known for taking his fists to repossessors. Then, Lou and Matt derail an international expedition when they haul off with a tourist bus. And, Sonia and Froy bring some unwanted heat...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess.

programme.title: Operation Repo: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock of a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: When You're Confused
programme.desc: A world of confusion is left on the doorstep of this sisterhood, as they attempt to find solace in their own individual relationships. (S3, ep1)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Acting Normal
programme.desc: Andi finds herself in the middle of Fatima and Karen, who both want Zac. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Gift of Goodbye
programme.desc: Zac helps a passenger retrieve an item she left on a plane, and the tip she gives him could be life-changing. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: The Game: The Side Part, Under Episode
programme.desc: Melanie meets her very own Dr. McHottie at the hospital where she is a first year resident.

programme.title: The Game: Oh, What A Night
programme.desc: Tasha, being insecure, worries that her relationship with Rick Fox has no future, so she starts playing the field.

programme.title: The Game: The Negotiation Episode
programme.desc: Derwin helps Jason try to win Kelly back, putting an end to all divorce talk, but then things go not as planned.

programme.title: The Game: Insert Car Here
programme.desc: Jason loses his mind when he finds Kelly on a date with another man named Joe, in the car he gave her for a gift.

programme.title: The Game: Stay Fierce, Malik
programme.desc: During an exclusive interview with Extra's Tanika Ray whatever, Robin Givens insinuates that Malik is gay, and for that reason, he wants to break up with her.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of this spin-chilling episode. Nursing their wounds from the last episode the team and their celebrity guests ‘Bullet For My Valentine’ carry on.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall Part 1
programme.desc: Saltmarshe Hall is a mysterious, haunted house of complete contrasts. Beneath the property lies a network of corridors and cellar rooms and the abandoned North Wing has sat empty for over 70 years,

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall Part 2
programme.desc: Saltmarshe Hall is a mysterious, haunted house of complete contrasts. Beneath the property lies a network of corridors and cellar rooms and the abandoned North Wing has sat empty for over 70 years,

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ye Olde Kings Head
programme.desc: The Great British pub may be on the decline but in some paranormal activity seems to be on the rise and the Ye Olde Kings Head is one of the most haunted.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: High school seniors hope they get the dates they want for prom.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Mother and a Daughter
programme.desc: An estranged daughter is writing a vengeful expose about her mother, a much-beloved movie star.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Normal People
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark visit a halfway house for people who were confined to mental facilities but released because they were deemed no longer a danger to society.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Hero
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet is denied government assistance, despite having lost a leg and an arm.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Parents' Day
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark work as police detectives in a school. Their assignment: to investigate drug selling.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny and Ed are anxiously preparing for a review with JLW, the pharmaceutical company that fund their Endangered Species Project. They are desperate for it to go smoothly, and as a result are driving the rest of the family mad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Following the loss of their funding, the family are in dire financial straits. Danny and Ed attempt to get an extension on their mortgage but are refused. Fiona spurs Ed on, telling him that the man she used to know would have a plan for survival.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My Tortured Soul
programme.desc: A woman’s lifeless body is dumped on a lonely mountain pass. Leads are scarce, until a seemingly unrelated murder brings Kenda within arm’s reach of her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Officer Down
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda is faced with his worst nightmare when he learns a friend and fellow officer, Mark Dabling, has been killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Mr. LA
programme.desc: A young man tries to flee a violent scene, but is shot dead behind the wheel of his car. A peculiar clue puts Kenda hot on the heels of a self-styled gangster with revenge on his mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: When the Music Stops
programme.desc: Vietnam War veteran Charles Walker is found unconscious, after a stabbing attack so savage even 45 units of blood couldn’t save his life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Master Key
programme.desc: When a pregnant mother and her two young sons are brutally slain, pressure mounts for the CSPD to catch the cold-blooded monster who did it.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lockdown
programme.desc: When a crazed gunman terrorizes his neighborhood, officers put themselves in the line of fire to restore order.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Beagle Mania, Rescue Me… Rescue You
programme.desc: At six years old, beagle Gizmo has become very aggressive. Jennifer Lee Pryor runs Pryor’s Planet, a rescue organization to honor her late husband, comedian Richard Pryor.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: The Red Zone
programme.desc: Two new sibling dogs fight over everything, from food to toys. Facing the possibility of giving up one of the pooches, Cesar travels south to end the civil war between the two dueling pit bulls.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Dasher, Riley, and Fosse

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: North Leeds

programme.title: The Rhythm and Roots of Arthur

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Barnes, Art Expert/Arthur's Lucky Pencil

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Adds It Up/Wish You Were Here

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Imaginary Friend/Arthur's Lost Library Book

programme.title: Arthur: Two Minutes/Messy Dress Mess

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The German invasion of Russia from Operation Barbarossa on 22 June 1941 to Kursk on 5 July 1943.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
